resources.string: Pacman, our hero, munches his way around the room, eating all of the Pac-dots. However, life isn't easy for our young little hero. Along his journey, he faces spooky Ghosts who will try to harm him. Avoid them at all costs. In each corner of the room there is a "Power Pellet." When Pacman eats one, the Ghosts turn blue and Pacman will be able to temporarily eat them as well.
You can control your character by swiping up, down, left and right on your screen.\n Double tap the screen to pause
